html:
Credit Management

The module provides students with the general principles of credit management as well as ensuring students’ understanding in the application of credit management principles. The module allows students’ understanding on clear distinction of credit management for personal, business as well as international market. In the end, the module enhances students’ understanding on the importance of credit management in personal and business environment and lays a foundation for more complex credit management topics.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Demonstrate an understanding of the principles of credit management and the knowledge to apply these principles. [Knowledge and understanding, Learning, Analysis]

+  Discuss credit management principles for personal, business and international environment. [Knowledge and understanding, Reflection]

+  Evaluate current credit management practices and behaviours in the local and international environment. [Analysis, Problem solving, Application]

Module Content:
